general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic and administrative programs and services offered by Sharda University, including its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It highlights key reports, initiatives like the Academic Bank of Credits and Curricula Feedback, and general university information such as its brochure, leadership, history, and tenders. The text also details student support services, skill enhancement programs, entrepreneurship initiatives, FM radio station, and important guidelines for international students regarding visas and medical insurance.

programs.program_name: Master of Science in Computer Science
eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field with a minimum GPA of 3.0
Strong foundation in programming and algorithms
required_documents: Official transcripts from all previous institutions
English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS) for international applicants

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
eligibility_criteria: Minimum GPA of 2.5 in high school

career_path.summary: This text outlines career opportunities available after completing a law course, including roles such as Legal Advisors, Deputy Legal Advisors, Public Prosecutors, and Corporate Lawyers. It also highlights that students from this program typically secure placements with average annual packages ranging from 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in law.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Legal Advisors
• Deputy Legal Advisors
• Public Prosecutors
• Corporate Lawyers
• Law Reporters
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in law.
